content:
<rule id="removed-packages-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
            	<javaclass references="java.rmi.activation.{*}">
            		<location>IMPORT</location>
            	</javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="The java.rmi.activation detected">
                    <message>
                        RMI activation and its associated daemon, rmid, and code package, java.rmi.activation were deprecated in OpenJDK 15 and removed in OpenJDK 17.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/407" title="JEP 407: Remove RMI Activation"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
